Uses of Package
eu.iv4xr.framework.mainConcepts

Packages that use eu.iv4xr.framework.mainConcepts
Package
Description
eu.iv4xr.framework
iv4xr.framework is built on the nl.uu.cs.aplib.
eu.iv4xr.framework.environments
 
eu.iv4xr.framework.goalsAndTactics
Contains examples of suggested goals and tactics that developers can implement.
eu.iv4xr.framework.mainConcepts
 
nl.uu.cs.aplib.exampleUsages.miniDungeon.testAgent
This package contains the implementation of iv4xr Env, State, TacticLib, GoalLib etc, which are necessary to allow an aplib/iv4xr test agent to control the game in the smart way.
  • Classes in eu.iv4xr.framework.mainConcepts used by eu.iv4xr.framework
    Class
    Description
    ObservationEvent.VerdictEvent
    When a test-agent interacts with a system-under-test, it will want to report things that meet its expectations, as well as things that violate its expectations (and may thus imply bugs).
    TestAgent
    This class implements a test-agent.
    TestGoal
    A TestGoal is a Goal, but you can additionally specify a test oracle.
  • Classes in eu.iv4xr.framework.mainConcepts used by eu.iv4xr.framework.environments
    Class
    Description
    Iv4xrAgentState
    Representing the state of an iv4xr agent.
    Iv4xrEnvironment
    An extension of the standard Environment.
    WorldModel
    This describes a fragment of a virtual world in terms of how it is structurally populated by in-world entities.

  • Classes in eu.iv4xr.framework.mainConcepts used by eu.iv4xr.framework.mainConcepts
    Class
    Description
    EmotiveTestAgent
    An extension of TestAgent that can also has emotion.
    IEmotion
    An interface for generically represent emotion and its intensity.
    IEmotionState
    A generic interface for representing the emotional state of an agent.
    Iv4xrAgentState
    Representing the state of an iv4xr agent.
    Iv4xrEnvironment
    An extension of the standard Environment.
    ObservationEvent
    Observation-events represent observations that a test-agent (TestAgent) collects.
    ObservationEvent.CoveragePointEvent
    When performing a series of tests, we usually want to know how 'complete' the tests were.
    ObservationEvent.ScalarTracingEvent
    This event is used to record a vector of (p,vs) where p is an agent's current position and vs is a bunch of scalar-values, organized as name-value pairs.
    ObservationEvent.TimeStampedObservationEvent
    This class is used to represent observation-events that need to be time-stamped.
    ObservationEvent.VerdictEvent
    When a test-agent interacts with a system-under-test, it will want to report things that meet its expectations, as well as things that violate its expectations (and may thus imply bugs).
    SyntheticEventsProducer
    Agents (instances of BasicAgent or its subclasses) are mainly state-based.
    TestAgent
    This class implements a test-agent.
    TestDataCollector
    This class is used to collect information from one or more test-agents.
    TestDataCollector.CoverageMap
    This class is used to keep track which coverage-points were visited.
    TestDataCollector.EventTrace
    This class is used to hold a chronological list of time-stamped events.
    TestGoal
    A TestGoal is a Goal, but you can additionally specify a test oracle.
    WorldEntity
     
    WorldModel
    This describes a fragment of a virtual world in terms of how it is structurally populated by in-world entities.
